snippet.title: Rainbow Road - Mario Kart 64 (Restored) (old version)
snippet.description:
Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjgYLlBR8GBW5wRRuXleh7oIuiEMPDR_l

This song was restored using the original source samples from:
• Digidesign Samplecell II
• Roland JD-990
• Roland JV-1080
• Roland SoundCanvas SC-88

I used N64 Soundbank Tool for ripping the sequence data, FL Studio for rendering the audio with the original samples, and Audacity for mixing everything together. I've tried to make it sound as close to the original as I can, though there could be some mistakes here or there.

You can find a lossless download for this song (and others) here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NVosjdPUMo0VyRltcYnlRDkr13PSiCIQ?usp=sharing

If you want to use this in a video you're free to do so, though credit would be greatly appreciated! However, please don't just re-upload the songs yourself and claim them as your own.

I used the VGM Sound Sources Spreadsheet as a guide for finding which samples were which. If you're interested in this kind of thing, I'd highly recommend checking it out as it has information for hundreds of different games:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JJBlHHDc65fhZmKUGLrDTLCm6rfUU83-kbuD8Y0zU0o/
